channel.title: Contribution on YF Robotics Laboratory
channel.description: Recent content in Contribution on YF Robotics Laboratory

item.title: Development
item.description: We love opensource and we make innovations using opensource software and hardware including: Linux gnu / gcc ROS / Gazebo Arduino Raspberry Pi ESP8266 / ESP32 BBC Micro:Bit Microsoft MakeCode Processing …

item.title: Research
item.description: We work and publish academic papers in the research area of: Reinforcement learning and transfer learning Operating systems and task scheduling targeted for robots Dexterous robot hand and manipulator Control and sensory technologies Safety assurance for autonomous systems …
